1.name: Blade Runner
1.description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

2.name: Diner
2.description: A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.

3.name: The Thing
3.description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

4.name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
4.description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

5.name: Conan the Barbarian
5.description: A young boy, Conan, becomes a slave after his parents are killed and tribe destroyed by a savage warlord and sorcerer, Thulsa Doom. When he grows up he becomes a fearless, invincible fighter. Set free, he plots revenge against Thulsa Doom.

6.name: The King of Comedy
6.description: Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.

7.name: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
7.description: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.

8.name: Cat People
8.description: A young woman's sexual awakening brings horror when she discovers her urges transform her into a monstrous black leopard.

9.name: First Blood
9.description: Former Green Beret John Rambo is pursued into the mountains surrounding a small town by a tyrannical sheriff and his deputies, forcing him to survive using his combat skills.

10.name: Poltergeist
10.description: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.

11.name: Annie
11.description: A young orphan girl's adventures in finding a family that will take her.

12.name: Sophie's Choice
12.description: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

13.name: Grease 2
13.description: An English student at a 1960s American high school has to prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

14.name: The Dark Crystal
14.description: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

15.name: TRON
15.description: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

16.name: The Verdict
16.description: A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

17.name: Forbidden World
17.description: In the distant future, a federation marshal arrives at a research lab on a remote planet where a genetic experiment has gotten loose and begins feeding on the dwindling scientific group.

18.name: Gandhi
18.description: Gandhi's character is fully explained as a man of nonviolence. Through his patience, he is able to drive the British out of the subcontinent. And the stubborn nature of Jinnah and his commitment towards Pakistan is portrayed.

19.name: Rocky III
19.description: After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.

20.name: Tootsie
20.description: Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.

21.name: An Officer and a Gentleman
21.description: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.

22.name: Zapped!
22.description: A high school science nerd gains telekinetic powers after a laboratory accident and uses them for revenge upon bullies.

23.name: Creepshow
23.description: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales based on the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.

24.name: Pink Floyd: The Wall
24.description: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

25.name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
25.description: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

26.name: Friday the 13th Part III
26.description: Having revived from his wounds, Jason Voorhees takes refuge at a cabin near Crystal Lake. As a group of co-eds arrive for their vacation, Jason continues his killing spree.

27.name: Q
27.description: NYPD detectives Shepard and Powell are working on a bizarre case of a ritualistic Aztec murder. Meanwhile, something big is attacking people of New York and only greedy small time crook Jimmy Quinn knows where its lair is.

28.name: The Secret of NIMH
28.description: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

29.name: Fanny and Alexander
29.description: Two young Swedish children experience the many comedies and tragedies of their family, the Ekdahls.

30.name: 48 Hrs.
30.description: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him, in order to track down a killer.

31.name: The Beastmaster
31.description: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

32.name: The Last Unicorn
32.description: A brave unicorn and a magician fight an evil King who is obsessed with attempting to capture the world's unicorns.

33.name: The Beast Within
33.description: A young woman gets raped by a mysterious man-creature, and years later her son begins a horrific transformation into a similar beast.

34.name: The World According to Garp
34.description: A struggling young writer finds his life and work dominated by his unfaithful wife and his radical feminist mother, whose best-selling manifesto turns her into a cultural icon.

35.name: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
35.description: A town's Sheriff and regular patron of a historical whorehouse fights to keep it running when a television reporter targets it as the Devil's playhouse.

36.name: The Year of Living Dangerously
36.description: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.

37.name: The Entity
37.description: A woman is tormented and sexually molested by an invisible demon.

38.name: Death Wish II
38.description: Architect Paul Kersey once again becomes a vigilante when he tries to find the five street punks who murdered his daughter and housekeeper, this time on the dark streets of Los Angeles.

39.name: Swamp Thing
39.description: After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.

40.name: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
40.description: Kids all over America want Silver Shamrock masks for Halloween. Doctor Daniel Challis seeks to uncover a plot by Silver Shamrock owner Conal Cochran.

41.name: The Slumber Party Massacre
41.description: A high school student's slumber party turns terrifying as an escaped mental patient with a drill decides to crash the evening.

42.name: Night Shift
42.description: A morgue attendant is talked into running a brothel at his workplace after a deceased pimp is sent there. However, the pimp's killers don't look too kindly on this new 'business', nor does the morgue's owner.

43.name: Victor Victoria
43.description: A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.

44.name: Fitzcarraldo
44.description: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.

45.name: Airplane II: The Sequel
45.description: A faulty computer causes a passenger space shuttle to head straight for the Sun. Can Ted Striker save the day and get the shuttle back on track - again?

46.name: Basket Case
46.description: A young man carrying a big basket that contains his extremely deformed Siamese-twin brother seeks vengeance on the doctors who separated them against their will.

47.name: Class of 1984
47.description: A new teacher at a troubled inner-city high school soon ends up clashing with the delinquent leader of a punk posse that runs the school.

48.name: Still of the Night
48.description: A Manhattan psychiatrist probes a patient's murder and falls for the victim's mysterious mistress.

49.name: The Last American Virgin
49.description: The friendship of a group of young friends struggling with teen sex, drugs, and work is jeopardized by a romantic interest which may turn pals into bitter rivals.

50.name: Butterfly
50.description: In 1937 Nevada, silver mine caretaker Jess Tyler is reunited with his teenage daughter Kady who will do anything to persuade Jess to let her have claim to the mine.
